TopicTitle: Engine Nacelle and Radial Engine Body...

Articles.Content:
Apart from giving you something to put an engine on, nothing yet, airflow didn\'t make it into 0.15

Later on these parts and others will be needed to get enough air to the air breathing engines so they can work.
When im flying and looking at the engine details the intakes kick in when optimal airflow drops below the max to keep air flowing.
